translation.en: True!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ True ♪
♪ True! ♪
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪
translation.es: Deseará por ti y por mí.

translation.en: ♪ Hero, hero! ♪
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom ♪
Okay, here we go!
With Bartleby's skillful serve,
Friendship Day slowball show down has begun!
translation.es: e inicia el duelo del Día de la Amistad!

translation.en: Oh, and True returns it with a stunning, spiral swoop!
translation.es: ¡Vera la devuelve con una genial caída en espiral!

translation.en: Excellent elevation. I got it!
Wait for it...
Keep waiting...
I call this the slow- mo slowball flip- flop tail- chop!
translation.es: Lo llamo golpe de cola con giro lento de bola lenta.

translation.en: Great moves, Bartleby!
Uh, where'd it go?
Okay... not a problem, I'll get the ball and stay completely dry while doing it.
translation.es: No hay problema, iré por la pelota y no me mojaré al hacerlo.

translation.en: Just... I...
Come on, ball!
Come to Bartleby...
Sorry I grabbed your tail, B, but I thought it was an emergency.
translation.es: Perdón por agarrarte la cola, me pareció una emergencia.

translation.en: It was! I almost got wet!
But you would never let that happen, would you, True?
Well... not on Friendship Day.
translation.es: Bueno... no en el Día de la Amistad.

translation.en: Grizelda?
Ta- da! We're here to brighten your Friendship Day!
translation.es: ¡Ta-da! ¡Vinimos a iluminar su Día de la Amistad!

translation.en: You brightened it alright. You got a dimmer switch on that thing?
Now that everyone's here, I have something to show you.
translation.es: Ahora que están todos aquí, tengo algo que mostrarles.

translation.en: Come on!
So for Friendship Day, I made you all...
translation.es: Para el Día de la Amistad, les hice a todos

translation.en: friendship bracelets!
Presents?
Thanks, True! That's so thoughtful of you.
Cool! We're all matchy- matchy.
No one told me we give presents on Friendship Day.
translation.es: No sabía que dábamos regalos el Día de la Amistad.

translation.en: I would have got you all really good presents.
You don't have to.
I just felt like making friendship bracelets for my friends.
translation.es: Solo quise hacerles pulseras a mis amigos.

translation.en: And there are lots of different ways you can show you care on Friendship Day.
translation.es: Puedes mostrar tu amistad de muchos modos hoy.

translation.en: Like baking nummleberry cookies to share! Want one?
translation.es: Como compartir galletas de bayas ácidas. ¿Quieres?

translation.en: Oh great, now we're sharing too.
And friends look after each other, like, um...
translation.es: Y los amigos se cuidan entre sí...

translation.en: when True saved me from getting wet.
translation.es: como cuando Vera me salvó de mojarme.

translation.en: Here you go, Frookie.
But I didn't make gifts or bake cookies or save anyone.
translation.es: Pero no hice regalos ni galletas, ni salvé a nadie.

translation.en: I didn't do anything nice!
When do I get to be nice?
Well, we couldn't have Friendship Day without you.
translation.es: No habría Día de la Amistad sin ti.

translation.en: You were there for us when we needed you.
Well, I am really good at showing up.
A grippity- grab! Get it off!
True, get it off me!
Okay, hold still and I'll grab it...
translation.es: No te muevas y lo agarraré.

translation.en: Yikes!
Okay. Gimme a sec.
translation.es: Dame un segundo. Debe haber un modo correcto

translation.en: There's got to be a right way to remove a grippity- grab.
translation.es: Dame un segundo. Debe haber un modo correcto de quitar un cangripiti.

translation.en: Ooh! Hurry!
translation.es: de quitar un cangripiti. - ¡Rápido! - ¡Ay! ¡Atacan los bocadillos!

translation.en: Yikes! It's a grippity- grab snack attack!
Save the snacks!
Shoo! Shoo! Get off!
Frookie! Look out! A grippity is after your pretty neckerchief!
Hey! The grippities are taking all our fashion accessories!
Since when do grippity- grabs care about style?
They don't. But they do like shiny things.
translation.es: No les importa, pero les gusta lo brillante.

translation.en: In fact, legend has it there's a giant grippity- grab in the sea
translation.es: La leyenda dice que hay un gran cangripiti en el mar

translation.en: with a whole cave full of shiny treasure. So if the grippity- grabs like shiny things...
translation.es: - con una cueva de tesoros brillantes. - Si les gusta lo brillante...

translation.en: Here little grippity, want this?
Problem solved!
You saved me, True.
You saved me! And you gave up your bracelet to do it!
translation.es: ¡Me salvaste! ¡Y regalaste tu pulsera para hacerlo!

translation.en: You're such a great friend!
It's no big deal. I'm just glad you're okay.
translation.es: No es gran cosa. Me alegra que estés bien.

translation.en: I'm a great friend too. Just you wait and see! I'm going to get your bracelet back.
translation.es: Yo también soy buena amiga. ¡Ya lo verás! Recobraré tu pulsera.

translation.en: Stop! Come back with True's bracelet!  Yeah and my glasses!
translation.es: - ¡Alto! ¡Dame la pulsera de Vera! - ¡Y mis gafas!

translation.en: Yeah, nummleberry cookies don't work so well as sunglasses.
translation.es: Las galletas no sirven como gafas de sol.

translation.en: Mmm. But they taste great.
You come back here, you little grippities! You are ruining Friendship Day!
translation.es: ¡Regresen, cangripitis! ¡Arruinarán el Día de la Amistad!

translation.en: Being a good friend is harder than I thought.
translation.es: Ser buen amigo es más duro de lo que creí.

translation.en: I'll just make True a new, even better friendship bracelet.
translation.es: Le haré a Vera una pulsera de amistad aún mejor.

translation.en: Out of extra special, super sparkly seashells, handpicked by me.
translation.es: De conchas marinas superbrillantes y especiales, elegidas por mí.

translation.en: Patience, Frookie- kins. We'll play as soon as I'm done being thoughtful.
translation.es: Paciencia, Fruki-pu. Jugaremos cuando acabe de ser atenta.

translation.en: Ta- da! All done. Isn't it irresistible?
Of course it is!
Hey!
You must be that giant grippity- grab who collects shiny things.
translation.es: Eres el gran cangripiti que colecciona cosas brillantes.

translation.en: Look, I totally get liking pretty things, but I'd like my bracelet back now please.
translation.es: Entiendo que te gusten las cosas bonitas, pero dame mi pulsera.

translation.en: Hey! Give it back!
That's not a toy, you know! I made that for a friend.
translation.es: ¡No es un juguete! La hice para una amiga.

translation.en: What? No. Not you.
A princess can't be friends with someone so shellfish.
translation.es: Una princesa no puede ser amiga de un crustáceo.

translation.en: No fair! I can't swim that far. I'm not some fish, you know.
translation.es: ¡No es justo! No puedo nadar tan lejos. No soy un pez.

translation.en: What did you just do?
And why do my feet fell all floppy?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué siento los pies flexibles?

translation.en: My perfect princess toes!
How am I supposed to try on new shoes?
I thought Grizelda would be back by now.
translation.es: Creí que Griselda ya habría vuelto.

translation.en: Let's go find her.
That shouldn't be too hard. Just follow that bright light.
translation.es: No será difícil. Sigamos la luz brillante.

translation.en: - Um... that's the sun, Bartleby. - Oops.
translation.es: - Ese es el sol, Bartleby. - Ay.

translation.en: Um, hi, Mr Sun! Happy Friendship Day!
We should be able to follow Grizelda's footprints in the sand.
translation.es: Podemos seguir sus huellas en la arena.

translation.en: Good idea, Zee. Let's go!
Give it back!
This... day...
is... not... going like I planned.
translation.es: no está saliendo como lo planeé.

translation.en: Oops, sorry, Frookie.
I'm not used to having a floppy fish tail.
translation.es: No me acostumbro a la cola de pez.

translation.en: Wait here, Frookie- kins. - I won't be long. -
I just have to catch Grippity, get my friendship bracelet,
translation.es: Debo atrapar a Cangripiti, tomar mi pulsera

translation.en: and make him turn me back into a whole princess
translation.es: y hacer que me vuelva princesa

translation.en: so I don't have to spend the rest of my life in the sea. Bing, bing, boom! I'll be back soon.
translation.es: para no pasar mi vida en el mar. ¡Bing, bum! Ahora vuelvo.

translation.en: Toodles!
Look at that shine...
it's Grizelda!
With a giant grippity- grab!
The legend is true!
Grizelda has a fish tail!
What happened, Frookie?
Isn't it obvious what happened?
Grizelda would rather spend Friendship Day with a giant grippity than with us!
translation.es: Prefiere pasar el Día de la Amistad con un gran cangripiti que con nosotros.

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie, we'll take care of you.
Oh, the things we do for our friends. Yuck.
translation.es: Lo que hacemos por un amigo. Puf.

translation.en: Grizelda would never leave Frookie behind. Especially on Friendship Day.
translation.es: Griselda nunca abandonaría a Frookie. Sobre todo el Día de la Amistad.

translation.en: I think Grizelda needs our help. We have to go and save her.
translation.es: Creo que necesita ayuda. Debemos ir a salvarla.

translation.en: Wait, what? Like go in the water?
Yes, but since we haven't been turned into fish, we'll need Wish help!
translation.es: Sí, pero como no somos peces, necesitamos ayuda de los deseos.

translation.en: Cumulo!
Come on, Frookie, you too.
To the Wishing Tree, please!
Happy Friendship Day to you too, Wishes!
translation.es: ¡Feliz Día de la Amistad a ustedes también!

translation.en: But there's no time to chat, our friend needs our help!
translation.es: No hay tiempo para hablar. Nuestra amiga necesita ayuda.

translation.en: Right. Let's sit...
and have a think.
Okay, True, how can the Wishing Tree help you?
translation.es: Vera, ¿cómo puede ayudarte el Árbol de los Deseos?

translation.en: Well, we think a giant grippity- grab turned Grizelda into a...
translation.es: Creemos que un gran cangripiti convirtió a Griselda en...

translation.en: ...an extra shiny fish- girl.
So I need a Wish to undo the spell and turn Grizelda back into herself.
translation.es: Debo romper el hechizo y convertir a Griselda en ella misma.

translation.en: And since Grizelda is under the sea,
translation.es: Y como está bajo el mar,

translation.en: I need a Wish that will allow me to travel underwater. It's Friendship Day, we should all go and help.
translation.es: - debo poder viajar bajo el agua. - Es el Día de la Amistad. Todos iremos.

translation.en: - - As long as I can stay completely dry.
translation.es: Mientras no me moje en absoluto.

translation.en: Alright. I need a Wish that will take us all underwater.
translation.es: Bien. Necesito un deseo que nos lleve a todos bajo el agua.

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
translation.es: El Árbol de los Deseos te escuchó.

translation.en: It is time to get your three Wishes. I'm ready.
translation.es: - Es hora de concederte tus tres deseos. - Estoy lista.

translation.en: Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree, please share your wonderful Wishes with me!
translation.es: Árbol de los Deseos, por favor, compártelos conmigo.

translation.en: ♪ Wishing Tree ♪
♪ Share with me ♪
- ♪ Tiny Wishes, one, two, three ♪ - Subba!
♪ Wishing Tree, please share with me ♪
Un- Doo!
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
Shim- Shim!
♪ Magic power ♪
♪ In the Wishing Tree ♪
What an inspiring combination of Wishes!
I can't wait to see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
translation.es: Ya quiero ver qué dice la Deseopedia de sus poderes.

translation.en: So this is Subba.
- Hi, Subba! -
Subba is an underwater Wish.
Subba gets big enough to fit all your friends inside and keep them dry.
translation.es: Crece para que quepan tus amigos y no se mojen.

translation.en: Oh, I like him! Best Wish yet.
That's perfect! Subba will help us all travel underwater to find Grizelda.
translation.es: ¡Perfecto! Nos ayudará a viajar bajo el agua para hallar a Griselda.

translation.en: Your next Wish is... Un- Doo.
Well, hell- oo, Un- Doo.
Un- Doo!
This is a reversing Wish.
When it spins backwards over something, it undoes it.
translation.es: Cuando gira al revés sobre algo, lo deshace.

translation.en: But Un- Doo can only be used once.
translation.es: Pero solo puede usarse una vez.

translation.en: If this Wish can turn Grizelda back into a two- legged princess,
translation.es: Si puede convertir a Griselda en una princesa de dos piernas,

translation.en: then Un- Doo only has to work once.
And your last wish is... Shim- Shim.
translation.es: Y tu último deseo es Shim-Shim.

translation.en: Shim- Shim has helped us once before.
It's a wish that's really good at wiggling.
Hello again, Shim- Shim! That...  tickles!
I'm not sure how wiggling can help save Grizelda, but I'll think of something.
translation.es: No sé cómo el meneo ayudará a Griselda, pero pensaré en algo.

translation.en: Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zila, deseos a mi mochila!

translation.en: Now let's go get our friend Grizelda.
Thank you, Wishing Tree! Happy Friendship Day!
translation.es: ¡Gracias, Árbol de los Deseos! ¡Feliz Día de la Amistad!

translation.en: How do fish swim with these floppy tails anyway?
translation.es: ¿Cómo nadan los peces con estas colas?

translation.en: - - Excuse me, coming through.
You can't catch me!
You can't get away from me that easy, Grippity.
translation.es: No huirás de mí tan fácilmente.

translation.en: This fish tail is supremely annoying.
translation.es: Esta cola de pez es tan molesta.

translation.en: Uh... thanks?
So you're giving me the bracelet back?
I guess not.
Poor little, Frookie.
You miss Grizelda, don't you?
But don't worry, we'll find her under all that water, won't we, True?
translation.es: Tranquilo, la hallaremos bajo el agua, ¿no, Vera?

translation.en: You bet! Time for my first Wish!
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Subba, Wish come true!
Hi, Subba! We need to go under the sea to find Grizelda. Can you help us out?
translation.es: ¡Hola! Vayamos bajo el mar a buscar a Griselda. ¿Nos ayudas?

translation.en: Uh- huh! Subba!
All aboard!
Okay, Subba, into the sea!
Everybody keep an eye out for Grizelda.
She should be pretty easy to spot with that shiny tail.
translation.es: Debe ser fácil verla con esa cola brillante.

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I see it! Yeah, behind that rock!
Uh, that way, Subba.
Boom, boom!
Hmm, that's not her. It's a school of fish.
translation.es: No es ella. Es un banco de peces.

translation.en: All those fish are wearing the same tail as Grizelda.
translation.es: Todos tienen la misma cola que Griselda.

translation.en: She is not gonna be happy with that.
Hey! How are we going to spot Grizelda if everything has a shiny tail?
translation.es: ¿Cómo la veremos si todo tiene una cola brillante?

translation.en: Don't worry, Frookie. Grizelda is down here somewhere. We'll find her.
translation.es: Calma, Frookie. Griselda está por aquí. La encontraremos.

translation.en: But how? It's not as easy as following her tracks in the sand.
translation.es: ¿Cómo? No es tan fácil como seguir sus huellas en la arena.

translation.en: Right, she can't leave footprints if she doesn't have feet.
translation.es: Sí, no puede dejar huellas si no tiene pies.

translation.en: Grizelda may not be leaving tracks but Giant Grippity is!
translation.es: Griselda quizá no deje huellas, ¡pero el gran Cangripiti sí!

translation.en: Good thinking, True!
Told ya, Frookie! True will find Grizelda in no time.
translation.es: ¿Ves, Frookie? Vera hallará a Griselda pronto.

translation.en: Okay, Subba, follow those tracks.
No fair!
You know I can't walk out of the water into...
translation.es: Sabes que no puedo salir del agua en...

translation.en: ...this amazing cave! Your home is almost as nice as my palace.
translation.es: ¡esta increíble cueva! Tu casa es casi tan linda como mi palacio.

translation.en: So many pretty shiny things!
Including me!
I'm not a half- fish,
I'm an adorable, glamorous, unbelievably cute mermaid!
translation.es: ¡soy una sirena adorable, glamorosa e increíblemente linda!

translation.en: If only my friends could see me now!
I miss them, you know, especially my best friend Frookie.
translation.es: Los extraño, sobre todo a mi mejor amigo, Frookie.

translation.en: And Zee and Bartleby and True...
translation.es: Y a Zee, Bartleby y Vera.

translation.en: She's the one I made the beautiful bracelet for.
translation.es: Hice esa linda pulsera para ella.

translation.en: You know how it is with friends.
translation.es: Sabes cómo es con los amigos.

translation.en: Oh! Maybe not.
Oh, thank you!
translation.es: ¡Gracias! Debo dársela a Vera por el Día de la Amistad

translation.en: I have to give this to True for Friendship Day to show what an amazing friend I am.
translation.es: ¡Gracias! Debo dársela a Vera por el Día de la Amistad para mostrar qué buena amiga soy.

translation.en: Ooh, a pearl!
It's so beautiful.
I love shiny things. Wait a sec! Is this for me?
translation.es: Amo las cosas brillantes. Espera un segundo. ¿Es para mí?

translation.en: So you want to be friends?
Yeah, yeah! Yeah, yeah, yeah!
All that chasing and hiding was just playing?
translation.es: ¿La persecución y el escondite eran un juego?

translation.en: Well of course a princess and a grippity can be friends!
translation.es: Una princesa y un cangripiti pueden ser amigos.

translation.en: We have so much in common...
We both love shiny things, we both have beautifully decorated homes.
translation.es: Amamos lo que brilla, tenemos casas bellamente decoradas.

translation.en: Next time you can come to my house!
translation.es: La próxima vez, ven a mi casa.

translation.en: I'll have my Grizmos build us a waterpark and we can decorate it together!
translation.es: Mis grizmos harán un parque acuático y lo decoraremos juntos.

translation.en: Won't that be fun?
After you turn me back into a princess of course!
translation.es: Cuando me conviertas en princesa, claro.

translation.en: Oh, no!
Where's your magic thingy?
- - The clam has it!
Grippity, you have to get it out and change me back!
Oh no!
Can you use your pincers to cut yourself free?
If only my friend True were here. She'd know what to do!
translation.es: Si mi amiga Vera viniera, ¡ella sabría qué hacer!

translation.en: Maybe...
True!
Help!
Grizelda?
Help!
That way, Subba!
Subba!
My Frookie- kins! True, I knew you'd come find me.
translation.es: ¡Mi Fruki-pu! Vera, sabía que vendrías a buscarme.

translation.en: Wow! It is Grizelda.
And she really is a half- fish!
I'm not a half- fish, I'm a whole mermaid, thank you very much.
translation.es: No soy medio pez, soy toda una sirena, por si no lo ves.

translation.en: Did the giant grippity do this to you?
Yes, but he can't turn me back.
translation.es: Sí, pero no puede volverme a convertir.

translation.en: No problem! We'll undo his spell with my second Wish!
translation.es: ¡No importa! ¡Desharé su hechizo con mi segundo deseo!

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: - Wake up, Un- Doo! -
Wish come true!
This Wish can reverse what Grippity did to you.
translation.es: Este deseo anula lo que te hizo Cangripiti.

translation.en: Really? So, you can use your Wish to undo what he did to himself?
translation.es: ¿Sí? ¿Puedes usar tu deseo para deshacer lo que se hizo a sí mismo?

translation.en: He was trying to help me and he got all tangled up.
He was trying to help you... like a friend?
Well... yes.
He really is my friend.
A princess and a grippity can be friends, you know.
translation.es: Puedo ser amiga de un cangripiti.

translation.en: Grizelda, I can only use Un- Doo once.
translation.es: Griselda, solo puedo usar a Des-Haz una vez.

translation.en: If Un- Doo frees Grippity, I don't have a Wish to turn you back.
translation.es: Si Des-Haz libera a Cangripiti, no tengo deseos para convertirte.

translation.en: Then...
...use the Wish to free Grippity.
What?! We're friends now.
And friends are always there for you when you need them. Right?
translation.es: Los amigos te apoyan cuando los necesitas. ¿No?

translation.en: But what about you?
Grippity is the one who really needs help. I'm fine.
translation.es: Él necesita ayuda. Yo estoy bien.

translation.en: Um, Grizelda? You may not have noticed, but you have a fish tail.
translation.es: ¿Griselda? Quizá no lo notaste, pero tienes cola de pez.

translation.en: It's a mermaid tail! And being a mermaid isn't so bad.
translation.es: ¡Es una cola de sirena! Y ser sirena no es tan malo.

translation.en: But... you have to live in water!
translation.es: Pero tienes que vivir en el agua.

translation.en: Not a problem. I already have plans for a water park.
translation.es: No importa. Tengo planes para un parque acuático.

translation.en: And I could give Frookie swimming lessons.
translation.es: Y enseñaré a Frookie a nadar.

translation.en: - - She did not mean that!
Grizelda, are you sure?
I'm sure. Let's do this.
Okay, Un- Doo, do your thing!
Un- Doo!
Yeah!
Good job, Un- Doo!
Nice work, Un- Doo. Now back in the pack.
translation.es: Muy bien, Des-Haz. Vuelve a la mochila.

translation.en: I knew you could do it, True!
Thanks, B. Grizelda, that was very generous of you.
translation.es: Gracias, B. Griselda, fuiste muy generosa.

translation.en: Are you sure you'll be okay being a half- fish...
I- I- I mean mermaid?
Well, it was nice having a super sparkly tail, and I was starting to get the hang of swimming.
translation.es: Fue lindo tener una cola tan brillante, y comencé a acostumbrarme a nadar.

translation.en: But I do love my fancy shoes and running around with my little Frookie- kins.
translation.es: Pero amo mis zapatos lindos y caminar con Fruki-pu.

translation.en: Sorry, Grizelda. I don't think my last wish can turn you back into a princess.
translation.es: Lo siento. Dudo que mi último deseo te convierta en princesa.

translation.en: What's Grippity doing? What's going on?
Oh, Grippity's magic thingy is inside that clam.
translation.es: Su cosa mágica está en la almeja.

translation.en: His Trident? The same one he used to turn you into a mermaid?
translation.es: ¿Su tridente? ¿El que usó para volverte sirena?

translation.en: Of course!
But that clam clammed up and won't give it back.
translation.es: Pero la almeja cerró la boca y no se lo dará.

translation.en: I think we can fix that.
Time for my third Wish.
translation.es: Es hora de mi tercer deseo.

translation.en: Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
translation.es: ¡Zip, zap, zi, te elijo a ti!

translation.en: Wake up, Shim- Shim! Wish come true!
Shim- Shim the wiggle Wish? How will that help?
Remember how Shim- Shim tickled my arm in the Wishing Tree?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que me hizo cosquillas en el Árbol de los Deseos?

translation.en: I bet a little tickle can get that grumpy clam to loosen up!
translation.es: Un cosquilleo hará que la almeja gruñona se relaje.

translation.en: Um, I still don't get it.
That tickles!
See? You can't laugh with your mouth closed.
translation.es: No puedes reír con la boca cerrada.

translation.en: Oh, my! So if the Clam laughs, it will open.
translation.es: - ¡Cielos! - Si la almeja se ríe, se abrirá.

translation.en: Okay, Shim- Shim, wiggle away!
Shim- Shim makes the first move, the classic fast- slow- fast tickle.
translation.es: Shim-Shim hace el primer movimiento, el clásico cosquilleo rápido-lento.

translation.en: Oh! Clam blocks that move!
There'll be no laughing today.
Shim- Shim is really upping her game.
Clam is having a hard time ignoring the tickles.
Shim- Shim is tickling up, down and all around and shows no sign of stopping!
translation.es: ¡Shim-Shim hace cosquillas por todos lados y no parará!

translation.en: Uh- oh, Clam can't take it and...
translation.es: La almeja ya no aguanta y…

translation.en: The clam is open, folks! The clam is open!
translation.es: ¡La almeja se abrió, amigos! ¡La almeja se abrió!

translation.en: Now it's all up to Grippity to finish this. Here it comes!
translation.es: Ahora depende de Cangripiti terminar esto. ¡Aquí viene!

translation.en: - - Score!
You did it, Shim- Shim! Great job!
Now back in the pack. Shim- Shim!
It's all up to Grippity now.
I have legs again!
Thank you, Grippity. I knew you could do it. Good to have you back, Grizelda!
translation.es: - Gracias, Cangripiti. Sabía que podrías. - ¡Qué bueno que volviste!

translation.en: It's good to be back with all my friends.
translation.es: Es bueno volver con mis amigos.

translation.en: Now can we get back to celebrating Friendship Day up on the beach?
translation.es: ¿Podemos volver a celebrar el Día de la Amistad en la playa?

translation.en: I'm still a little nervous under the sea.
translation.es: Me pongo nervioso bajo el mar.

translation.en: Just a second.
Grippity?
For you, Grippity. You've earned it, my friend.
translation.es: Para ti, Cangripiti. Te la ganaste, amigo.

translation.en: Thanks for the great ride, Subba. Now back in the pack.
translation.es: Gracias por el paseo genial, Súbba. Vuelve a la mochila.

translation.en: What a great Friendship Day! We all really stuck together like good friends do.
translation.es: ¡Qué gran Día de la Amistad! Estuvimos unidos como buenos amigos.

translation.en: Okay, okay, stop it.
We're friends, I know.
translation.es: Somos amigos, lo sé. Ya basta.

translation.en: I think the best thing
translation.es: Lo mejor es que Griselda comenzó

translation.en: is that Grizelda started a new tradition for Friendship Day.
translation.es: Lo mejor es que Griselda comenzó - una tradición para el Día de la Amistad. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: - I did? - Ha!
translation.es: - una tradición para el Día de la Amistad. - ¿Sí?

translation.en: Make a new friend!
Yep, I am pretty awesome!
Oh, that is so Grizelda!
